title: Ireland
summary: Citi has had a presence in Ireland since 1965 and was one of the first foreign banks to open an office in the country. From its offices in Dublin, Citi Ireland services clients across over 160 countries and is the headquarters for Citibank Europe plc, the main bank subsidiary for Citi in Europe.
tag-2: Please be aware of scammers offering investments to retail customers in Ireland, including term deposits. Investors should be vigilant when they receive unsolicited offers from unknown parties. Citi in Ireland does not offer any financial products or services directly to retail clients.
tag-3: Citi provides banking and finance services to many of Ireland’s largest corporates and multinational subsidiaries

tag-13: If you are interested in career opportunities at Citi, visit https://jobs.citi.com/Dublin
